headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS IONIZATION GAUGE CONTROLLER
specstable:
Manufacturer Granville Phil
Model 330
Description 330 Ionization Gauge Controller
Cables Included No
Accessories

Cable see item 6799, Click here

Other Information

Click here for the manual
Controls and displays output of one ion gauge
Provides power for two thermocouple gauges, outputs analog signals with no pressure indication on display

The Granville Phillips 330 Ionization Gauge Controller measures pressure from less than 1 x10-10 to 1 x 10-1 torr from
a single ionization gauge and displays pressure readout via a front panel display and analog output. The 3 1/2" high modular
controller is available as a bench mount or space saving half-rack unit.

Condition Excellent
Power Requirements 120/240 V 1.0 A 0.5 A(2) 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 8.000 in (20.3 cm)
Depth 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 11 lb (5 kg)
